formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Compute differences: di = Bi − Ai. Remove pairs where di = 0. Rank the absolute differences |di| from smallest to largest (average ranks for ties). Assign each rank the sign of its original difference. Sum positive ranks → W+, sum negative ranks (absolute) → W−. Test statistic: T = min(W+, W−).

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Mean: \( \mu_T = \frac{n(n+1)}{4} \) Variance: \( \sigma_T^2 = \frac{n(n+1)(2n+1)}{24} \times \text{tie correction} \) z: \( z = \frac{T - \mu_T - 0.5}{\sigma_T} \) (two-sided p = 2(1 − Φ(|z|)))
